description.description: Auxiliary text, the color is a little lighter than the title, and the font size is also a little smaller, optional
description.description_zh: 辅助性文字，颜色比title浅一点，字号也小一点，可选

closable.description: Close button (default is the cross icon icon)
closable.description_zh: 关闭按钮(默认为叉号icon图标)

showIcon.description: Whether to display the secondary icon on the left
showIcon.description_zh: 是否显示左边的辅助图标

effect.description: When there are multiple images, the image is scaled and cropped mode
effect.description_zh: 多图时，图片缩放裁剪的模式

center.description: Whether the text is centered or not

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when a component is clicked
